Description:
Detects the usage of the "Squirrel.exe" binary to execute arbitrary processes. This binary is part of multiple Electron based software installations (Slack, Teams, Discord, etc.)


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Karneades / Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Process Proxy Execution Via Squirrel.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\squirrel.exe' or process_path like '%\update.exe') and (command like '%--processstart%' or command like '%--processstartandwait%' or command like '%--createshortcut%')) and  not (((command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\appdata\local\microsoft\teams\update.exe%' and command like '%teams.exe%') and (command like '%--processstart%' or command like '%--createshortcut%')) or ((command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\appdata\local\yammerdesktop\update.exe%' and command like '%yammer.exe%') and (command like '%--processstart%' or command like '%--createshortcut%')) or (command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\appdata\local\discord\update.exe%' and command like '% --processstart%' and command like '%discord.exe%') or ((command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\appdata\local\githubdesktop\update.exe%' and command like '%githubdesktop.exe%') and (command like '%--createshortcut%' or command like '%--processstartandwait%'))))
